name: South Island Select Climbers Guide 2020 Edition
categories: South Island Select Climbers Guide 2020 Editi
description: An updated version of the Vancouver Island South Climber's Guide. It covers areas in and around Victoria, Sooke, and Duncan and areas such as Fleming Beach, East Sooke Park, Sugarloaf, and Mt. MacDonald. Includes topos, detailed route descriptions and directions and access guidelines.
